name: Oslo's Puppy
description:
Description:
Oslo has a new pet, but the local farm animals aren't too happy about it. Use your fireball magic to protect your pet from the farm animals. The resulting charred animals also doubles as a nice snack for your pet.

The green bar is your pet's health; don't let it deplete!
The red bar is your pet's attack meter; it fills over time.
The blue bar is your mana; use it to make fireballs.

With art and music by the wonderful Stevie Galliart. Go check out her work.

Controls:
The controls can be a bit tricky due to the 2 button limitation of the theme.

To move: Use the left or right arrow keys.
To shoot a fireball: Press both left and right arrow keys at the same time. (It is best to think about this action as holding the key for the direction you want to face, and then tapping the other key.)

Jam Details:
This game was made in 3 days for the Ludum Dare 34 Jam in December of 2015. The theme of the jam was "Two Buttons" and "Growing." The game received the following rankings:

Category Rank (out of 1634 entries) Score (out of 5) Overall 384 3.45 Audio 418 3.19 Innovation 336 3.38 Graphics 286 3.86 Fun 262 3.48 Mood 385 3.37 Humor 287 3.08 Theme 87 4.21
